name: Romantic
description: Warm, heartfelt design with soft colors and elegant typography
ai_style_prompt: Enhance with warm, soft lighting, gentle bokeh, and rich romantic colors. Add a subtle warm glow.
quote_pool: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
I have found the one whom my soul loves.
You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Love is not about how many days, months, or years you've been together. It's about how much you love each other every single day.
Whatever our souls are made of, yours and mine are the same.
I loved you yesterday, I love you still. I always have, I always will.
